events.message: The customer reported an auto accident that occurred on May 10th, involving a rear-end collision with another vehicle at a traffic signal.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident based on the description involving the customer’s car and collision details.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned promptly to handle the customer’s vehicle accident case for a faster resolution.
A formal acknowledgement of receipt of the auto accident claim was sent to the customer via email with detailed next steps outlined.
The customer was requested to submit a police report, vehicle photos, and insurance documents necessary to proceed with the accident investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents including the police report and multiple photos of the damaged car from various angles.
The insurance team initiated a thorough investigation into the circumstances surrounding the collision and the extent of vehicle damage.
The investigation concluded with confirmation that the accident was caused by third-party negligence, supporting the customer’s claim.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering repair costs and rental car expenses up to the policy limits.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the responsiveness of the claims process through direct feedback.
Following customer agreement, the claim was officially approved, confirming the insured event and coverage for the damages sustained.
The approved settlement amount was disbursed directly to the customer’s bank account, facilitating vehicle repairs without delay.
The claim case was formally closed after payment issuance and confirmation from the customer that repairs had been satisfactorily completed.
